Title: Caro Michele
Writer: Suso Cecchi D'Amico, Natalia Ginzburg (novel), Tonino Guerra
Actors: Mariangela Melato, Delphine Seyrig, Aurore Clément, Lou Castel
Plot: Michael is the younger son of a middle-class family, a strong-willed and free-thinking fellow, who is off in some distant country fighting for a revolutionary cause.
